Sweden: Estonians, Curonians or/and Karelians invade and pillage Sigtuna and kill archbishop Johannes.
The city of Nyköping is founded.
Lebanon: Saladin conquers virtually all of the Kingdom of Jerusalem with the exception of Tyre, which held out under Conrad of Montferrat.
Estonia: Estonians, Karelians or/and Karelians ravage the Mälaren area in Sweden, pillage town of Sigtuna, and kill the archbishop Johannes.
Armenia: Debut of Leon II's reign as prince.
